title: Socialite

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, you may decide to Entertain the town at night. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players will attend the gathering the night after you decide to Entertain them.
- If a Jailor-type role jails someone during a gathering, both players will not attend the gathering.
- Factional evils will not be able to access their factional chat during a gathering.

desc:
Post 4740
*Proof that ToS2 is going for fun over balance...*
